00282 inline QtXorArg &
00283 QtXorArg::operator = ( const QtXorArg & arg )
00284 {
00285     if( this != &arg )
00286     {
00287         m_args = arg.arguments();
00288         m_required = arg.isRequired();
00289         m_name = arg.m_name;

00306 inline void
00307 QtXorArg::add( QtArgIface * arg )
00308 {
00309     if( arg && !m_args.contains( arg ) )
00310     {
00311         if( !arg->isRequired() )
00312                 m_args.append( arg );
00313         else
00314             throw QtArgRequiredArgumentUnderXORMaskEx(
00315                 QLatin1String( "A try to add required argument under the XOR mask." ) );
00316     }
00317 }

00331 inline bool
00332 QtXorArg::isDefined() const
00333 {
00334     bool defined = false;
00335 
00336     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, m_args )
00337         if( arg->isDefined() )
00338             defined = true;
00339 
00340     return defined;
00341 }

00349 inline void
00350 QtXorArg::check(
00351     const QChar & delimiter,
00352     QtArgIface::FlagsList & alreadyKnownFlags,
00353     QtArgIface::NamesList & alreadyKnownNames ) const
00354 {
00355     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, m_args )
00356         arg->check( delimiter, alreadyKnownFlags, alreadyKnownNames );
00357 }
00358 
00359 inline void
00360 QtXorArg::check() const
00361 {
00362     if( isRequired() && !isDefined() )
00363         throw QtArgNotDefinedMandatoryArgumentEx(
00364                 QString::fromLatin1( "Not defined mandatory argument: %1" )
00365                     .arg( m_name ) );
00366 
00367     QString definedArgumentName;
00368 
00369     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, m_args )
00370     {
00371         arg->check();
00372 
00373         if( arg->isDefined() && !definedArgumentName.isEmpty() )
00374             throw QtArgXORMaskNotObservedEx(
00375                 QString::fromLatin1( "Defined more than one argument under XOR mask."
00376                     " First defined argument: %1. Second defined argument: %2." )
00377                         .arg( definedArgumentName )
00378                         .arg( arg->names().size() ? arg->names().front()
00379                               : arg->flags().front() ) );
00380 
00381         if( arg->isDefined() )
00382             definedArgumentName =
00383                 ( arg->names().size() ? arg->names().front()
00384                     : arg->flags().front() );
00385     }
00386 }

00401 QtXorArg::giveArgument( const QChar & flag )
00402 {
00403     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, m_args )
00404     {
00405         QtArgIface * ret = arg->giveArgument( flag );

00408             return ret;
00409     }
00410 
00411     return NULL;
00412 }

00445 inline void
00446 QtXorArg::checkConstraint() const
00447 {
00448     if( isDefined() )
00449     {
00450         foreach( QtArgIface * arg, m_args )
00451             arg->checkConstraint();
00452     }

00455 inline QString
00456 QtXorArg::getUsageString( const NamesList & namesList ) const
00457 {
00458     QString usage;
00459 
00460     int count = 1;
00461 
00462     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, m_args )
00463     {
00464         usage.append( arg->getUsageString( namesList ) );
00465 
00466         if( count && count < m_args.size() )
00467             usage.append( QLatin1String( " | " ) );
00468 
00469         ++count;
00470     }
00471 
00472     return usage;
00473 }
